General.Name: Bluelinea SA
General.Description: Bluelinea Société Anonyme provides healthcare solutions for elderly and disabled people in France. The company offers POCSAG receivers, automatic smoke detectors, temperature sensors, emergency cases, transmitters and receivers, technical alarms, telephony and network, power supplies, bluetag, resident-patient, staff, common parts, automation, room amenities, disability, bluehub, training, supervision, location, usability screens, and pairing and notification products. It also provides nurse call, emergency suitcase, wandering and management of runways, fall prevention and detection, lone worker protection, access control, air quality, and motorization and automation products. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Elancourt, France.
